question:
Consider the following statements about mangroves in India:
  1. Mangroves are more predominant along the eastern coast than on western coast
  2. The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world
   Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: About 60% of the mangroves occur on the east coast along the Bay of Bengal, 27% on the west coast bordering the Arabian Sea, and 13% on Andaman & Nicobar Islands. Second statement is also correct. The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world.
